content:
[if]
	[change status]
		`hp`
		`>`
		`%`	0
		`end`
	[equipment upgrade]
		`upgrade`
		`=`	1	0
		`amplify`
		`=`	1	0
	[/equipment upgrade]
	[cooltime]
		5000
[/if]

[then]
	[target]
		`myself`	-1
	[equipment duration]
		5000
	[stat]
		`physical attack`
		`%`	1
	[stat]
		`magical attack`
		`%`	1
[/then]
